column1: === Climate ===
The region is classified as "hyper-arid"
column2: with annual precipitation generally less than 35 millimetres (1.4 in)
column3: and daily mean relative humidity of about 52% in January and 15% in June–July. Daily maximum temperatures average 47 °C (117 °F) in July and August
column4: reaching peaks of 51 °C (124 °F). The daily minimum average is 12 °C (54 °F) in January and February
column5: although frosts have been recorded. Daily extremes of temperature are considerable.
